website_summaries.verdict: Quality cleaning products from head to toe for the DIY washer who cares about cost as well.
pros: Includes Ultra Shine Wash and Wax, Original Protectant, tire foam, and glass wipes
Glass wipes provide a crystal clear, streak-free shine
High marks for its ability to clean and protect tires that may be exposed to severe elements
cons: Does not come with wipes or brushes

customer_reviews.title: Great Bargain ! Works fabulous!  0; ).
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the price. Armor all is the best for leather. Had someone detail my truck. Paid a kid trying to save for a place, as opposed to spending my money at a chain or large business. Came out better than a $200 detail, ( Yes , there are still some kids that actually want to earn dinero! 0;). Grazie seller! 0; (.
customer_reviews.author: Dobergirl77

customer_reviews.title: ‘‘Tis the season
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present for my brother in law, he just got a new truck and is totally geeked out on it. Figured he’d love a gift he could use to play with his new “baby”. Well after seeing shipment come in and the size of the box, lets just say, I’ll be placing another order for my boyfriend. Pretty excited to watch their faces light up when they see their new “toys”.
customer_reviews.author: M.I.D. (Motivate Inspire Dream)

customer_reviews.title: Great value on good name brand products
customer_reviews.text: Four car care products for less than the price of three of the four if purchased locally...what's not to love?? Protectant spray is awesome and is worth half of the $10 I paid for the four-product set, imo. Glass wipes leave streaksnunless you wipe down the glass with a clean, dry cloth after using the wipes. Have used this brand of wheel cleaner foam previously and loved it. Haven't used the wash yet but it appears to be a thicker consistency than the product of a different brand that I already have so it will *probably* require less product to wash the car.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mack

customer_reviews.title: Happy I got this!
customer_reviews.text: It comes with tire shine, window wipes, interior dash cleaner, and I can’t remember the other thing. The two I use the most are the window wipes and dash cleaner. Love this brand so I already knew I’d like the products. The box is compact enough so I just keep it in my trunk neatly at all times! Great value
customer_reviews.author: Crimsyn Hawk

customer_reviews.title: More than decent value
customer_reviews.text: The glass wipes left so many streaks that I ended up using them to clean tight areas in my car instead of glass. The wash and shine soap is really good actually and I like the smell of it. The interior spray stuff doesn’t seem to do anything really.
customer_reviews.author: Jalen

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The different items in the box are for detailing, washing the exterior, cleaning the car windows and the wheels. Great buy for the price, would recommend. will buy again as long as the price stays under $20
customer_reviews.author: Sheka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm completely satisfied with this product. I've only used it once, but based on the cost of your typical carwash, I'm way ahead of the game. Besides the cost savings, I do a much more thorough job than the average carwash, and I don't have to have a couple of sweaty carwash "professionals" climbing around in my car's interior during a pandemic. Bottom line is, more economical, and better for one's health to do it yourself at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G

customer_reviews.title: Best car washes
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy cleaning and washing my own car. It’s good to have your own products this stuff work great. Every time I use it it’s like my car is brand new again. Every man should have this in their car trunk or garage where we you wash ya car at. You can’t go wrong with this
customer_reviews.author: marshana johnson

customer_reviews.title: was unsure that it would be any good. Turns out that I was wrong
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a small gift...was unsure that it would be any good. Turns out that I was wrong! The package is great!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Product cleans well especially for the price I seen these packages in store and they range from 15-25$ great price would recommend. The tire foam works amazing the wash n wax leaves a nice glossy finish on my car and the glass wipes do work but they do leave a little white residue on the glass but still worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo

customer_reviews.title: *Don't waste your money*
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because of the tire shine thing is a joke there's no shine or wet look also the glass wipes are terrible they mess up your auto glass they never clean your auto glass they left water Marks and it's oily and watery only the good thing about this all in one is the car wash and dashboard protectant. Honestly I do not recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift idea for men or women that love to keep their car clean! I made these into gift baskets and added a couple sponges, a bucket , drying towel and air fresheners and it made the perfect gift! I highly recommend this gift set!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect this to ship well.
customer_reviews.text: I was giving this item as a gift (today) and realized as I unpackaged it that the car wash has leaked all over everything ruining the box and contents (and needless to say there’s no wash & wax left). Very disappointed. Guess he’s getting a gift card instead of a car wash kit. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Same price in-store at Walmart instead of used/opened/unuseable product(s).
customer_reviews.text: Wipes came in the box opened and dry. Picture for it wouldn’t suffice for how useless wipes were because it came opened and dry. Tire cleaner came rusted. At least I got everything it was supposed to come with unlike other review even if it didn’t come brand new as listed in buying option description. Will not return because price was reasonable BUT I will not buy from this seller, Amazon LLC, and will buy in person next time to make sure product is in perfect, unused, and useable condition.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Mae Thomas

customer_reviews.title: With effort comes results
customer_reviews.text: First off I believe I speak for every car enthusiasts when I say good car wash always smells soo good. This kit comes with tire shine, window wipes, wash and wax formula, and an interior washing spray bottle. The tire shine and interior wash is on par with any normal, good washing substance. The wash and wax (main reason you're buying this) is absolutely excellent. The only bad thing in this kit is the window wash. The little wipes dry out very quickly and leave little fuzzes, but does good with the cleaning part. Overall I still give it a 5/5 because it works and it's a damn good deal.
customer_reviews.author: superleggera

customer_reviews.title: Definetly love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and a great value! I am really pleased with the quality and service of the seller. I will definetly do business with this seller again and I recommend them to anyone. Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Jason W. Matick

customer_reviews.title: Not great packaging
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my dad for Father's Day and when it arrived, the wipes canister, the too had popped off and they were completely dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for 16 year old nephew
customer_reviews.text: Of course when you are just beginning to have the freedom of your first car you want it to shine. My nephew loved this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Father’s Day gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Father’s Day gift. My husband loves it. It had everything he needs to detail MY CAR. Hahahaha. Happy Father’s Day 😃
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Used as gift
customer_reviews.text: Car buff gift, he doesn't usually use everything in package, but does like the 2 he uses usually, so trying other 2. Knew he used brand so tried this, after all it was pretty good.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to be a gift for my nephew but not so giftable anymore. The box is all jacked up, looks like it’s been open. I’m Embarrassed to give this present away. The box is that BAD

customer_reviews.title: Car care cleaning kit
customer_reviews.text: Very Good products to use on and in your car, My product came to me opened and the glass cleaner wipes were all dry out, I contacted Amazon and they replaced it, the very next day it was on my doorstep. Thanks, Amazon:)
customer_reviews.author: maebee

customer_reviews.title: Made my car look beautiful again
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for the price, plenty of wipes to utilize and tire foam will keep your tires looking FRESH

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The window wipes dry up easily and tend to smear. I used them only when my windows were super dirty and I didn't have time to go to the car wash. The rest of the products are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Described as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Came fast and everything is accounted for and the box is in great shape so I’m pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael tavake

customer_reviews.title: Package was opened and box it was ripped
customer_reviews.text: Boxes are opened and ripped, not nice to see when they are gifts and look like the its been returned before.
customer_reviews.author: Jerelee Havermann

customer_reviews.title: Clean Car
customer_reviews.text: I have zero complaints with these products. They do as the are intended and clean my car. Great value for what you get as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bratlie

customer_reviews.title: Glass wipes leave streaks
customer_reviews.text: The glass wipes are terrible. They left my windows streakier than any other method I’ve used to clean my windows (soap and water, windex, etc). Everything else is okay (nothing special), which is why this got two stars instead of one.
customer_reviews.author: James McCaughan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Amazon Shipping "starting" to get better. Got here when said. Good product, good set
customer_reviews.author: minkyneese

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I got this a while back, and loved it so much I asked for it again for Christmas. Going to need to restock soon :-)

customer_reviews.title: Dried up wipes on delivery
customer_reviews.text: Items were open and the wipes were dried out. Don’t buy this kit

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with this kit
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this kit. My car is so shiny. The foam cleans the tires really good,and I do not need to use alot of the wash and wax. Just a little can go a far way. Go ahead and try it yourself.👍👍👍👍

customer_reviews.title: Clean, clean clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother when he turned 16. Thought it was a good soft idea for his first car.

customer_reviews.title: Beginners starting point
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift and it was well received. Nice starter pack for a car enthusiast who wants basic supplies. If you want expensive you can explore other brands, this is a great beginners car set.
customer_reviews.author: Brodey33

customer_reviews.title: All-Inclusive Set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these products as gifts. The recipients are very satisfied with the products included and use them regularly on their vehicles. I have purchased ArmorAll products in the past and will again. The purchase price was very reasonable.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great basic cleaning product for cars. I've owned several of these kits over the years and it does work well if all used properly and together.

customer_reviews.title: Delivery, was right at my door step thank you
customer_reviews.text: Really good cleaning products. Tried it on my tire really shines up nice

customer_reviews.title: Great value and Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for anyone who is into cars, is super simple and easy to use and is usable on almost any vehicle. This set has everything you need to keep your car clean yourself. (Personal advice: You may want to invest into a hand held vacuums if you go down the route of washing your own car.)

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not the best products out there. The soap to wash the car I had to use a lot for it to actually work and the wipes for the windows are horrible, they leave horrible wet marks

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great set to get my car looking brand new again. So easy to clean everything and quickly too!

customer_reviews.text: This is a good gift for the price! My son in law loves this brand so he loved this

customer_reviews.title: It’s great

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for any car

customer_reviews.title: Window wipes are no good!
customer_reviews.text: Good little kit but the wipes leave streaks on the windows. Previous reviewers had mentioned this problem. I figured I would take my chances and buy it anyway. Unfortunately they were all right.

customer_reviews.text: Waxes and washes also perfect for dashboard also smells good. I recommend it

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!

customer_reviews.title: Great brand and great products
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for all these cleaning supplies. I got three of these kits for my father and brothers. They were all happy with this brand anand products
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy It
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kit! It has full sized products of all 4 items - the car wash liquid, protective spray, Tire shine spray & the glass wipes. This is the best price I've seen for these items - the wipes alone have gone for $5 at big box stores. I used both the interior & exterior products this weekend & was very pleased with the results. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is because I feel like the glass wipes left streaks on my windows.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit for quick clean
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to clean my son's filthy car and this came up. It has everything you need for a quick clean. Only thing missing is something to clean the exterior with between car washes.

customer_reviews.title: All the basics for a fresh clean car
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need all at once in a great gift for a kid with his first brand new car

customer_reviews.title: Good essentials, but car soap and glass wipes could be better.
customer_reviews.text: All of the essentials to get going on a good car wash! I love that it provides a spray for the dashboard and also the tire spray is bomb. Unfortunately, I think the soap didn't clean as well as I had expected. Also, the glass wipes felt fairly dry already.

customer_reviews.title: Smaller portions than I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of small sizes. The car washing liquid is the best it cleaned my car very well. I liked everything in the kit!

product_meta.title: Armor All Car Wash and Cleaner Kit (4 Items) - 2pc Glass Wipes & Protectant with Wax & Wash Soap and Tire Shine Foam, 13703C
product_meta.description: Style:Complete Car Care KitThe Armor All Complete Car Care Kit delivers four proven Armor All products formulated to enhance your car’s looks and protect your automotive investment. Includes Armor All Original Protectant, Armor All Ultra Shine Wash & Wax, Armor All Tire Foam Protectant and Armor All Glass Wipes. The perfect gift for the car enthusiast!
feature_bullets: Complete Car Care Kit for the car enthusiast includes four proven Armor All products
10 fl. oz. Original Protectant that fights fading, aging and cracking while protecting against the effects of harmful elements like UV and oxidation
16 fl. oz. Ultra Shine Wash & Wax that gently lifts away dirt and delivers an incredible shine
20 fl. oz. Tire Foam Protectant that cleans your tires & restores natural, deep black appearance
Glass Wipes (25 count) for spotless, sparkling glass cleaning with amazing clarity and shine

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,164 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
